meanings.definition: A type of pasta in the form of long, flat strands.
meanings.sent1: I cooked linguine for dinner last night.
meanings.sent2: The linguine was perfectly al dente.
meanings.sent3: The linguine tried to escape the pot while boiling!
meanings.sent4: Her hair flowed like linguine in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The restaurant served linguine with a rich tomato sauce.

meanings.definition: A dish made with linguine pasta.
meanings.sent1: My favorite dish at the Italian restaurant is linguine with clams.
meanings.sent2: She ordered linguine with shrimp for lunch.
meanings.sent3: The linguine dish was so delicious, it disappeared in minutes!
meanings.sent4: The linguine dish was a work of art on the plate.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the linguine dish filled the kitchen with warmth.
